item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

10. 3 years ago, VCs in Bay Area tech were thriving. Now, they're 'bleeding cash.' (19 points | 11 comments)
11. U of T computational imaging researchers harness AI to fly with light in motion (10 points | 1 comment)
